languages.text: "Больше похоже на то, что комендант Кастелья узнал о мятеже на планете и решил воспользоваться ситуацией. Но точно я не знаю. Возможно, что и никто не знает — губернатор Медина предпочитает отстреливать бунтовщиков, а не разбираться в их мотивах и связях".

"It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."
languages.original_text: "Больше похоже на то, что комендант Кастелья узнал о мятеже на планете и решил воспользоваться ситуацией. Но точно я не знаю. Возможно, что и никто не знает — губернатор Медина предпочитает отстреливать бунтовщиков, а не разбираться в их мотивах и связях".

traits.locale_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can, as Governor Medineh prefers to shoot rebels rather than inquire into their motives and connections."

"It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can, as Governor Medineh prefers to shoot rebels rather than inquire into their motives and connections."

"It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than inquire into their motives and connections."

"It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than inquire into their motives and connections."

"It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

"It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

languages.text: «Parece más probable que el alcaide Casteglia se enterara de la rebelión de Rykad Minoris y decidiera aprovechar la situación en su beneficio. No puedo afirmarlo con certeza. Y es posible que nadie pueda. El gobernador Medineh siempre ha estado más dispuesto a disparar a los rebeldes que a indagar sobre sus motivos y conexiones».
languages.original_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

traits.locale_text: «Parece más probable que el alcaide Casteglia se enterara de la rebelión de Rykad Minoris y decidiera aprovechar la situación en su beneficio. No puedo afirmarlo con certeza. Y es posible que nadie pueda. El gobernador Medineh siempre ha estado más dispuesto a disparar a los rebeldes que a indagar sobre sus motivos y conexiones».

languages.text: "Es erscheint mir sehr viel wahrscheinlicher, dass Direktor Casteglia von der Rebellion auf Rykad Minoris erfahren hat und daraufhin entschieden, die Situation zu seinem Vorteil auszunutzen. Ich kann es nicht mit Gewissheit sagen. Vielleicht kann niemand das. Gouverneur Medineh hat es schon immer vorgezogen, Rebellen zu erschießen, statt sich nach ihren Motiven und Verbindungen zu erkundigen."
languages.original_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

traits.locale_text: "Es erscheint mir sehr viel wahrscheinlicher, dass Direktor Casteglia von der Rebellion auf Rykad Minoris erfahren hat und daraufhin entschieden, die Situation zu seinem Vorteil auszunutzen. Ich kann es nicht mit Gewissheit sagen. Vielleicht kann niemand das. Gouverneur Medineh hat es schon immer vorgezogen, Rebellen zu erschießen, statt sich nach ihren Motiven und Verbindungen zu erkundigen."

languages.text: « J'ai surtout l'impression qu'ayant eu vent de la révolte sur Rykad Minoris, le directeur Casteglia a décidé d'en profiter. Mais je ne peux pas l'affirmer avec certitude. Personne ne le peut, sans doute. Le gouverneur Medineh a toujours préféré tirer sur les rebelles, plutôt que de les interroger sur leurs motivations et leurs relations. »
languages.original_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai surtout l'impression qu'ayant eu vent de la révolte sur Rykad Minoris, le directeur Casteglia a décidé d'en profiter. Mais je ne peux pas l'affirmer avec certitude. Personne ne le peut, sans doute. Le gouverneur Medineh a toujours préféré tirer sur les rebelles, plutôt que de les interroger sur leurs motivations et leurs relations. »

languages.text: “更有可能是卡斯特格利亚典狱长得知了小莱卡德叛乱的情况，打算借机发起叛乱。我不能确定，或许没人能说得准。比起调查暴乱分子的动机与组织，梅迪涅总督更喜欢把他们直接枪毙。”
languages.original_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

traits.locale_text: “更有可能是卡斯特格利亚典狱长得知了小莱卡德叛乱的情况，打算借机发起叛乱。我不能确定，或许没人能说得准。比起调查暴乱分子的动机与组织，梅迪涅总督更喜欢把他们直接枪毙。”

languages.text: 「カスティーリア所長がライカド・ミノリスの反乱の事を聞きつけて、その状況を自分の利益のために利用しようと決めたのでしょう。確かなことは言えません。おそらく誰にも言えないでしょう。メディネ総督は、反乱分子の動機や人脈を探るよりも、彼らを射殺することをいつも好んでいました」
languages.original_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

traits.locale_text: 「カスティーリア所長がライカド・ミノリスの反乱の事を聞きつけて、この状況を自分に有利に利用しようとした可能性が高そうです。断言はできません。きっと他の誰も言い切れないとは思います。メディネ総督は昔から、反逆者の動機や繋がりの調査よりも、彼らを射殺する方がお好きでした」
「カスティーリア所長がライカド・ミノリスの反乱の事を聞きつけて、その状況を自分の利益のために利用しようと決めたのでしょう。確かなことは言えません。おそらく誰にも言えないでしょう。メディネ総督は、反乱分子の動機や人脈を探るよりも、彼らを射殺することをいつも好んでいました」

languages.text: "Müdür Casteglia'nın Rykad Minoris'teki isyanı haber alıp durumu avantajına kullanmak istemiş olması kuvvetle muhtemel. Bilemeyiz tabii, belki kimse bilemez. Vali Medineh genelde isyancıların gerekçe ve bağlantılarını sorgulamaktansa kendilerini infaz etmeyi yeğler."
languages.original_text: "It seems more likely that Warden Casteglia learned about the rebellion on Rykad Minoris and decided to use the situation to his advantage. I can't say for certain. Perhaps no one can. Governor Medineh has always preferred to shoot rebels rather than enquire about their motives and connections."

traits.locale_text: "Müdür Casteglia'nın Rykad Minoris'teki isyanı haber alıp durumu avantajına kullanmak istemiş olması kuvvetle muhtemel. Bilemeyiz tabii, belki kimse bilemez. Vali Medineh genelde isyancıların gerekçe ve bağlantılarını sorgulamaktansa kendilerini infaz etmeyi yeğler."
